name: Magic Lords: Multiplayer
description:
MAGIC LORDS: MULTIPLAYER - is a small 2D Fighter PVP game that allows 4 players to play simultaneously.


Try playing along with your friends and find out which of you is better.

A game that you and your friends will love! Simple controls and nice graphics.

    Game Features:
  • Multiplayer game
  • Several game maps are available for the game.
  • PvP game for 4 people
  • Several ways to customize your game
